data.author: Benjamin Franklin
data.quote: You may delay, but time will not.

data.author: Mahatma Gandhi
data.quote: Take care of this moment.

data.author: Napoleon Hill
data.quote: Every adversity, every failure, every heartbreak, carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.

data.author: Nelson Mandela
data.quote: I never lose. I either win or learn.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.quote: No matter how many mistakes you make or how slow you progress, you are still way ahead of everyone who isn't trying

data.author: Che Guevara
data.quote: Be realistic, demand the impossible!

data.author: plato
data.quote: A good decision is based on knowledge and not on numbers.

data.author: Ernest Hemingway
data.quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterwards, some are strong at the broken places

data.author: Harry Main
data.quote: If you believe you can do it, go out there and do it, because that is the only way you are gonna get it!

data.author: anonymous
data.quote: Pick your life, don't let it pick you.

data.author: O Feltham
data.quote: The greatest results in life are usually attained by common sense and perseverance.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Before death takes away what you are given, give away what there is to give.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Don’t grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: What you seek is seeking you.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the stronger pull of what you really love.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Words are a pretext. It is the inner bond that draws one person to another, not words.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: In your light I learn how to love. In your beauty, how to make poems. You dance inside my chest where no-one sees you, but sometimes I do, and that sight becomes this art.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Gamble everything for love, if you are a true human being. Halfheartedness does not reach into majesty.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: This is love: to fly toward a secret sky, to cause a hundred veils to fall each moment. First to let go of life. Finally, to take a step without feet.
